sentences.en: Add a dash of balsamic vinegar.
sentences.cn: 加入少许香脂醋。

sentences.en: Balsamic vinegar is aged in wood for at least 10 years and the flavour is wonderful.
sentences.cn: 意大利香醋在木桶中就经历了至少10年的酝酿期，所以口味极佳。

sentences.en: But before you opt for south of the border fare without flair, consider this: Two of the product's ingredients, vinegar and salt, in combination seem to cause a reaction that cleans the pennies.
sentences.cn: 但在你没有准备好去南部边境生活的时候：要考虑两种产品的成分，醋和盐，这一组合的联合使用，似乎可以引起一个清洗金钱的反作用。

sentences.en: Can we have some salt / pepper / vinegar / mustard, please?
sentences.cn: 可以帮我加一些盐、胡椒粉、醋、芥末吗？

sentences.en: He filled a cup with kerosene, castor oil and vinegar.
sentences.cn: 他往杯子里装满了煤油 、 蓖麻油和醋.

sentences.en: His retort was delivered with a strong note of vinegar.
sentences.cn: 他的反驳带着强烈不满的口气.

sentences.en: If the sauce seems too sweet, add a dash of red wine vinegar.
sentences.cn: 如果酱汁太甜的话，可以加少许红酒醋。

sentences.en: In cooking, vinegar can be used alone or to add flavor without calories to our food, but what will it do if we use it on our hair?
sentences.cn: 在烹饪中，醋可以单独食用，也可以用作食物调味料不附加任何卡路里，但如果我们把它涂抹到头发上呢？

sentences.en: onions pickled in vinegar
sentences.cn: 用醋泡制的洋葱

sentences.en: Put in just a dash of vinegar.
sentences.cn: 稍许放一点点醋.

sentences.en: She flavored the fish with sugar and vinegar.
sentences.cn: 她用糖和醋给鱼调味.

sentences.en: The  sugared  vinegar is  refined from the sugarcane and  pine.
sentences.cn: 加糖的醋是从甘蔗和松木中精炼出来的.

sentences.en: The sauce smacked of vinegar.
sentences.cn: 这调味汁有点醋味.

sentences.en: The sugared vinegar is refined from the sugarcane and pine.
sentences.cn: 加糖的醋是从甘蔗和松木中精炼出来的。

sentences.en: To make the red-wine vinaigrette, whisk together the oil, vinegar and mustard in a medium bowl until well combined.
sentences.cn: 制作红酒醋油沙司，将油、醋和芥末放在一个中等大小的碗里一起搅拌，直到混合均匀。

sentences.en: Use a solution of 1 tablespoon of vinegar to 1 pint of warm water.
sentences.cn: 要用一大汤匙的醋加一品脱温水的比例调制的溶液.

sentences.en: Use half a lemon dipped in salt and vinegar.
sentences.cn: 用半个柠檬蘸上盐和醋.

sentences.en: Vinegar is used in preserving food.
sentences.cn: 醋可用来保存食物.

sentences.en: We mix oil and vinegar to put on salad.
sentences.cn: 我们把油和醋搀和在一起,用来拌色拉.

sentences.en: Wine vinegar tenderises meat.
sentences.cn: 酒醋能让肉变嫩。

sentences.en: With vinegar and brown paper.
sentences.cn: 用醋和棕色纸张包扎。

words.tran_cn: 不愉快的；尖酸的；乖戾的；有醋味的

trans.tran_cn: 醋，乖戾，尖酸刻薄，<口>充沛的精力
trans.tran_en: a sour-tasting liquid made from malt or wine that is used to improve the taste of food or to preserve it
